short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Remove distracting döts from The New Yorker.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
This simple extension removes the diaereses (the little dots over the second vowel in words like "coöperate") from articles in The New Yorker. Why? Because they're fussy and distracting.

Want the dots on some articles? Re-enable (or maybe reënable) them in just a click.

By @reedkavner
